tool_description: Get information on the latest announcements of new tokens arriving to exchange platforms!
name: Crypto-Platform-Releases
title: Crypto-Platform-Releases

api_list.name: Get All Release News
api_list.description: This will return all the new releases from the platforms we are following.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-platform-releases.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-platform-releases.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-platform-releases.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-platform-releases.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
